summary: Self-driven and detail-oriented IT Specialist with over a decade of experience supporting complex financial systems, process optimization, and infrastructure monitoring in the banking sector. Adept at scripting, incident management, client communication, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about psychology, video games, and technology-driven solutions.

experience.title: Manual and Automated Software Testing Course
experience.description: Completed a comprehensive 24-week QA training program covering manual and automated testing methodologies. Gained hands-on experience with Cypress for end-to-end testing and Postman for API testing. Managed test cases and defects using JIRA. Final project — CandyStore (https://github.com/Infrael/CandyStore) — involved building automated test suites to ensure full coverage of a web application's functionality and interface.

experience.title: FI & WSO IT Specialist
experience.description: Supported Fixed Income trading systems and Wall Street Office tools across multiple environments. Maintained in-house scripts (Python), managed servers, and participated in system stability monitoring. Contributed to code deployments by updating Docker containers and verifying production changes, including occasional unit testing. Logged and tracked technical issues through JIRA. Collaborated daily with developers, analysts, and stakeholders in agile scrum meetings to ensure timely resolution and smooth releases. Occasionally participated in on-call rotation for production systems.

experience.title: BARX Client Technical Services Analyst
experience.description: Delivered technical support to institutional clients across trading platforms involving Foreign Exchange, Fixed Income, and Structured Products. Handled onboarding, account configuration, and connectivity troubleshooting. Tracked issues and daily tasks using JIRA and ServiceNow, coordinated with developers for escalations, and occasionally contributed to internal software updates. Maintained SLA expectations and participated in post-incident reviews when required.

experience.title: Service Assurance Analyst
experience.description: Focused on the incident lifecycle by analyzing ServiceNow data to uncover patterns and improve operational processes. Created reports and presentations to communicate incident trends and SLA metrics using Excel and PowerPoint. Contributed to improving support workflows and standardizing reporting templates used for daily incident tracking. Helped maintain internal SOPs and supported the creation of knowledge base documentation.

experience.title: Senior Support Analyst
experience.description: Handled high-priority escalations for business-critical incidents, ensuring timely coordination across departments and quick resolution paths. Acted as the main liaison between technical teams and stakeholders to maintain transparency during outages or major disruptions. Communication was primarily conducted via Outlook, phone, and internal ticketing systems.

experience.title: Telephony Support Analyst
experience.description: Started at Barclays as a first-line IT Support analyst for internal customers. Provided technical assistance via phone and email, focusing on incident resolution and system troubleshooting. As experience grew, took on business-critical escalations and became a trusted contact for urgent support needs.
